TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SqlSpatialFunctions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the SQL spatial functions for the SQL client.

.method public static hidebysig string AsTextZM(class System.Data.Spatial.DbGeography geographyValue) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) Well-Known Text (WKT) representation of a geography instance augmented with any Z (elevation) and M (measure) values carried by the instance.

.method public static hidebysig class System.Data.Spatial.DbGeography EnvelopeCenter(class System.Data.Spatial.DbGeography geographyValue) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a point that can be used as the center of a bounding circle for the geography instance.
Docs.returns: A SqlGeography value that specifies the location of the center of a bounding circle.

Docs.summary: Returns the specified ring of the SqlGeography instance: 1 ≤ n ≤ NumRings().
Docs.returns: A SqlGeography object that represents the ring specified by n.
